skins.shipDescription: Brooklyn-class Light Cruiser C Honolulu, Hull Number CL-48!
skins.selfIntroduction: I'm Honolulu of the Brooklyn-class. I've basically only ever served in the Pacific. I was damaged pretty bad once, but somehow I managed to make it... At least I was luckier than Helena...
skins.acquisition: Brooklyn-class, Honolulu, reporting in. Hey, listen... could you stop staring at me like that? It's not like they're this big because I wanted them to be...
skins.login: Why do I have to wait for you here...
skins.details: Maintenance? Fine, as long as you don't do anything weird...
skins.secretaryIdle1: I don't seem very Hawaiian even though my name is Honolulu? Well gee, my bad...
skins.secretaryIdle2: Helena's always acting so gloomy... You should think of ways to make her smile too, Commander.
skins.secretaryIdle3: I was born with this personality. I don't hate you or anything like that...
skins.secretaryTouch: Do you just go around touching everyone you see? Do you need anything?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: *Sigh*... If you're gonna be this direct then I don't even feel like getting mad at you...

skins.shipDescription: If everyone's focusing on the teacher, they probably won't stare at me from up front... As for the umbrella, it's... I know it makes me stand out, but I don't want people to stare at me from behind either...
skins.acquisition: If everyone's focusing on the teacher, they probably won't stare at me from up front... As for the umbrella, it's... I know it makes me stand out, but I don't want people to stare at me from behind either...
skins.details: Y-you want to eat lunch together? Really? I bet you're just teasing me. Or are you... just hoping to get a taste of Helena's cooking?
skins.secretaryIdle1: I made a friend at school. He's brown, cuddly, and doesn't say a word, though...
skins.secretaryIdle2: There's nobody who's like you at school. Nobody who sometimes makes me laugh, sometimes makes me cry, and sometimes... Gosh, what am I saying...
skins.secretaryTouch: It's small, but it's the only umbrella I could find. S-so, when 2 people are sharing it... i-it's only natural they'd have to stand so close together...
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: I-I don't have anything going for me besides my bust anyway...

skins.shipDescription: Aaaahh! My sundae! What's up with this stupid hose?! Commander, don't just stand there, help me!
skins.acquisition: Aaaahh! My sundae! What's up with this stupid hose?! Commander, don't just stand there, help me!
skins.details: Commander, you're the one who messed with my cannons, didn't you? A-admit it! Admit it while you still have the chance...
skins.secretaryIdle1: *Gasp*! Where the heck is all this water coming from?!
skins.secretaryIdle2: Commander, you don't sound convincing at all when you tell me my swimsuit is cute while you're laughing!
skins.secretaryIdle3: *Sob*... Everyone's going to laugh at me...
skins.secretaryTouch: You called over Helena?! This is NOT the way I want to make her laugh!
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: How could you, Commander... I'll hose you till you're as soaked as I am!

skins.JPClientName: プレゼント?ファイアレッド
skins.shipDescription: Stupid Louis... "If you dress up as a reindeer for Christmas, you'll have an easy time talking to Helena"... You think I'm stupid enough to believe that...?! *Eeeeeek*?! C-Commander?! Get out, right now!
skins.acquisition: Stupid Louis... "If you dress up as a reindeer for Christmas, you'll have an easier time talking to Helena"... You think I'm stupid enough to believe someth...? *Eeeeeek*?! C-Commander?! Get out, right now!
skins.login: C-Commander! You did that on purpose, didn't you?!
skins.details: "Special Christmas lingerie"... I never should've listened to Louis! I need to put on this whole costume quick, before someone sees me...!
skins.secretaryIdle1: *Sigh*... Just thinking about that idiot standing behind me with a straight face makes all my motivation go away...
skins.secretaryIdle2: I-I tripped just a moment ago, and these ribbons got all tangled up around me... Ahahaha, I'm such a klutz... What are the ribbons for...? U-uhh...
skins.secretaryIdle3: That's a wonderful Christmas tree...? T-thanks... Hey, hold on, don't you have anything else to say?!
skins.secretaryTouch: My plans for Christmas? Um, let's see... Hey, hold on, why are you asking that with a straight face to someone who's dressed like this?!
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: *Eek*?! Commander, when did you get here...?!

skins.shipDescription: Come on, Louis, the goldfish stall is this way! ... W-why are you giving me that weird look like thC Wait... Eeeek! C-Commander?! When did you get here?!
skins.acquisition: Come on, Louis, the goldfish stall is this way! ... W-why are you giving me that weird look like thC Wait... Eeeek! C-Commander?! When did you get here?!
skins.login: I'll say this now: I don't like festivals in any... Ah, you know what, never mind! Just come with me, okay?!
skins.details: Wh-what are you staring at me for... Is it weird to have fun at a festival now...?
skins.secretaryIdle1: Stupid Louis... She just went "I'd rather not be kicked by a horse" and walked off... Let's just forget about her... Commander, do you want... some fried squid?
skins.secretaryIdle2: Y-you saw how flustered I was just now, didn't you... I don't hate you or anything like that, you know...
skins.secretaryIdle3: Goldfish scooping is pretty hard... Could you lend me a hand, Commander? I want one to give to Helena...!
skins.secretaryTouch: Seems there'll be a fireworks display by the harbor... Commander, how about we go there on our walk?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Don't make excuses... I know you did that on purpose...!
